system.gameStart: You enter a dungeon dimly lit dungeon. Water drips in the distance and creatures scurry in the dark.  Nearly out of earshot, there is a faint chattering.

bufonid.name: Bufonid
bufonid.description: A small frog-like creature whose back is covered in thick, warty skin.

bufonidQueen.name: Queen
bufonidQueen.description: The fierce matrons of the bufonid clans.
